channel.title: infosec on Braindump
channel.description: Recent content in infosec on Braindump

item.title: Recon - Port Scanning and nmap
item.description: Basic nmap scan nmap -sC -sV -oA nmap/result <ip> Flags: -oA <basename>: Output in the three major formats at once -sV: Probe open ports to determine service/version info -sC: default scripts UDP Scan sudo nmap -sU -sS -sC -sV -oA <NAME>.udp <IP> -v Script categories List available nse scripts nmap through socks4 proxy ftp bounce scan format ports=$(nmap -p- -Pn --min-rate=1000 -T4 10.10.11.205 | grep '^[0-9]' | cut -d '/' -f 1 | tr '\n' ',' | sed s/,$//) nmap -p$ports -Pn -sC -sV 10.

item.title: Web Pentest - Wordpress
item.description: Wordpress WPScan Enumerate vulnerable plugins, users, db exports: wpscan --url <url> -e dbe,u,vp
